doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: NXP i.MX6 SDHC Ultra Secured Digital Host Controller

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Support only for memory card features.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Slave port for register and data accesses

doctext.name: txt_6
doctext.text: Re-Tuning Request (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Current block read is non-exact block read. It is only used for SDIO.

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: BURST length enable for INCR, INCR4 / INCR8 / INCR16, INCR4-WRAP / INCR8-WRAP / INCR16-WRAP

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Removal

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Insertion

doctext.name: txt_5
doctext.text: Wakeup Event Enable On Card Interrupt

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Tuning Error: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_11
doctext.text: Tuning Pass:(only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_12
doctext.text: Re-Tuning Event: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Tuning Error: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_11
doctext.text: Tuning Pass:(only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_12
doctext.text: Re-Tuning Event: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Tuning Error: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_11
doctext.text: Tuning Pass:(only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_12
doctext.text: Re-Tuning Event: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Command Not Issued By Auto CMD12 Error

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Feedback Clock Source Selection (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Auto Tuning Enable (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Tuned clock or Fixed clock is used to sample data / cmd (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Execute Tuning: (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode)

doctext.name: txt_6
doctext.text: In DDR 4-bit mode nibble position indictation

doctext.name: txt_5
doctext.text: Force Event Data End Bit Error

doctext.name: txt_7
doctext.text: Force Event Data Time Out Error

doctext.name: txt_9
doctext.text: Force Event Command End Bit Error

doctext.name: txt_11
doctext.text: Force Event Command Time Out Error

doctext.name: txt_12
doctext.text: Force Event Command Not Executed By Auto Command 12 Error

doctext.name: txt_13
doctext.text: Force Event Auto Command 12 Index Error

doctext.name: txt_14
doctext.text: Force Event Auto Command 12 End Bit Error

doctext.name: txt_15
doctext.text: Force Event Auto Command 12 CRC Error

doctext.name: txt_16
doctext.text: Force Event Auto Command 12 Time Out Error

doctext.name: txt_17
doctext.text: Force Event Auto Command 12 Not Executed

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: ADMA Error State (when ADMA Error is occurred)

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: When SLV_OVERRIDE = 1 This field is used to select 1 of 128 physical taps manually. A value of 0 selects tap 1, and a value of 0x7f selects tap 128.

doctext.name: txt_5
doctext.text: Enable manual override for slave delay chain using SLV_OVERRIDE_VAL

doctext.name: txt_7
doctext.text: The delay target for the uSDHC loopback read clock

doctext.name: txt_8
doctext.text: Force the slave delay line to update to the DLL calibrated value immediately

doctext.name: txt_10
doctext.text: Enable the DLL and delay chain

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Number of delay cells added on the feedback clock between the feedback clock and CLK_PRE

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Number of delay cells added on the feedback clock between CLK_PRE and CLK_OUT

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Number of delay cells added on the feedback clock between CLK_OUT and CLK_POST

doctext.name: txt_6
doctext.text: Number of delay cells on the feedback clock between the feedback clock and CLK_PRE

doctext.name: txt_7
doctext.text: Number of delay cells on the feedback clock between CLK_PRE and CLK_OUT

doctext.name: txt_8
doctext.text: Number of delay cells on the feedback clock between CLK_OUT and CLK_POST

doctext.name: txt_9
doctext.text: Only for debug. Force CLK output active when sending Abort command

doctext.name: txt_10
doctext.text: Only for debug. Polarity of the WP pin

doctext.name: txt_11
doctext.text: Only for debug.Polarity of the CD_B pin

doctext.name: txt_12
doctext.text: Only for debug.Polarity of DATA3 pin when it is used as card detection

doctext.name: txt_13
doctext.text: Check busy enable after auto CMD12 for write data packet

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Stop At Block Gap value of automatic mode

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Enable auto stop at block gap function

doctext.name: txt_7
doctext.text: Boot ACK time out counter value

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Disable the feature to clear the Card interrupt status bit when Card Interrupt status enable bit is cleared

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Enable the auto tuning circuit to check the CMD line

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Enable the auto tuning circuit to check the DATA0 only. It is used with the TUNING_8bit_EN together.

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Enable the auto tuning circuit to check the DATA[7:0]. It is used with the TUNING_1bit_EN together.

doctext.name: txt_6
doctext.text: Interrupt window after abort command is sent.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: SD Card Interface busy LED drive

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: The name of the Image file used for the SD Drive

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: If present the SD Drive uses delta writes
